TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的数字签名的 C14N XML 标准化转换（不带注释）。

span.span: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示描述 XML 文档的规范格式的 C14N XML 规范化转换。The class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document. 此转换允许签名者创建摘要 （用于创建数字签名） 使用 XML 文档的规范格式。This transform allows a signer to create a digest (used to create a digital signature) using the canonical form of an XML document. 然后，收件人可以验证 XML 文档的相同的规范格式使用相同的转换的 XML 数字签名。A recipient can then verify the XML digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform. 使用类在你需要注册不包含注释的 XML 文档。Use the class when you need to sign an XML document that does not contain comments. 在大多数情况下，不需要规范化转换类的新实例。In most cases, a new instance of a canonicalization transform class is not required. 若要指定规范化转换，请将传递描述到转换的统一资源标识符 (URI)属性，它是可从访问属性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要获取的规范化转换的引用，使用属性，它是可从访问属性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 用于描述的 URI类定义由字段和字段。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field and the field. 仅需要创建手动哈希 XML 文档或使用你自己的规范化算法规范化转换类的新实例。You would only need to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class for manually hashing an XML document or for using your own canonicalization algorithm. 有关 C14N 转换的详细信息，请参阅部分 6.5 和 6.6.1 XMLDSIG 规范中，可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the C14N transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. W3C 规范 XML 规范，位于 www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n 中定义的规范化算法。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何使用分离的签名的非 XML 数据进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign non-XML data using a detached signature. 示例 #1 的 XML 文件中创建 www.microsoft.com 的签名，然后验证该文件。Example #1 creates a signature of www.microsoft.com in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二个示例演示如何调用的成员类。The second example demonstrates how to call members of the class. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/CPP/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]
